title: Bidders list and proposals submitted for RFI 1107  Child Care Assistance Program Information System for the New York Office of Children and Family Services

communications.subject: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: Bidders list and proposals submitted for RFI 1107  Child Care Assistance Program Information System for the New York Office of Children and Family Services
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

Find the RFI solicitation documents, bidders list and proposals submitted for RFI 1107  Child Care Assistance Program Information System released in October 2022 by the New York Office of Children and Family Services. Also find any notices of award, contracts awarded, and all related documentation.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Toni Thompson

title: Deloitte contract for CCWIS System Integrator RFP B16539/B17047 with the Illinois Department of Early Childhood

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: Deloitte contract for CCWIS System Integrator RFP B16539/B17047 with the Illinois Department of Early Childhood
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Find the request for proposal, statement of work, award notice, and all documents related to the contract award to Deloitte for Illinois Department of Early Childhood CCWIS System Integrator RFP B16539/B17047; Notice of Award made Dec 2021.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Toni Thompson

title: Contract Award for Illinois Department of Early Childhood for RFP 19-444DHS-MIS44-B-7213

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: Contract Award for Illinois Department of Early Childhood for RFP 19-444DHS-MIS44-B-7213
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Find the request for proposal, statement of work, contract award notifications, all related documents and the contract awarded for the Child Care Management System Replacement RFP 19-444DHS-MIS44-B-7213 issued in June 2019 by the Illinois Department of Early Childhood.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Toni Thompson

title: Contract Awarded to the Illinois Child Care Resource and Referral Agency with the Illinois Department of Early Childhood

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: Contract Awarded to the Illinois Child Care Resource and Referral Agency with the Illinois Department of Early Childhood
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Find the request for proposal, scope of work, and all related documents for a contract awarded to the  Illinois Child Care Resource and Referral Agency (INCCRRA) for child care subsidy eligibility, referrals and payments.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Toni Thompson

title: Contract with KinderSystems for the Missouri Department of Elementary and Secondary Education Child Care Business Information Solution

communications.subject: The Missouri Sunshine Law Request: Contract with KinderSystems for the Missouri Department of Elementary and Secondary Education Child Care Business Information Solution
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the The Missouri Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Find the request for proposal, statement of work, amendments, and all related documents for the contract and renewals awarded to KinderSystems  for the Missouri Department of Elementary and Secondary Education Child Care Business Information Solution.  Contract # CT170002001. It was extended through June 30, 2024 and may have additional extensions.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Toni Thompson
